trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> can be reevaluated.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> pode ser reavaliadas.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used to limit the number of times that a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> runs, primarily to prevent infinite loops.
trans-unit.target: Esta enumeração é utilizada para limitar o número de vezes que um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>é executado, principalmente para impedir que os ciclos de infinito.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this field is `Always`.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido para este campo é `Always`.

trans-unit.source: This means that the number of times the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> is run is not limited, and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> can be run as many times as determined by the chaining cycles in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> evaluation.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que o número de vezes o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>é executado não é limitado e o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>podem ser executadas muitas vezes, conforme determinado pelos ciclos de cifras no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>avaliação.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> can be reevaluated multiple times.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> pode ser reavaliadas várias vezes.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> is executed once.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> é executado uma vez.

trans-unit.source: A condition may be evaluated several times until the rule executes actions, but the rule will never be evaluated again.
trans-unit.target: Uma condição pode ser avaliada várias vezes até que a regra executa as ações, mas a regra nunca será avaliada novamente.
